VisitFrequency.ColumnAverageVisitDurationForNewVisitors: Avg. amount of seconds spent by new visitors
VisitFrequency.ColumnAverageVisitDurationForReturningVi: Avg. amount of seconds spent by returning visitors
VisitFrequency.ColumnMaxActionsInReturningVisit: Max actions in one returning visit
VisitFrequency.ColumnSumVisitLengthReturning: Total amount of seconds spent by returning visitors across all visits
VisitFrequency.NewAverageVisitDuration: avg. time spent by new visitors
VisitFrequency.NewBounceRate: new visitors have bounced (left the website after one page)
VisitFrequency.PluginDescription: Reports metrics about your returning and (first time) new visitors.
VisitFrequency.ReturnAverageVisitDuration: avg. time spent by returning visitors calculated from each of their visists
VisitFrequency.ReturnBounceRate: returning visitors have bounced (left the website after one page)
VisitFrequency.ReturningVisitDocumentation: Someone coming back to visit the website again is a returning (as opposed to a new) visitor.
VisitFrequency.ReturningVisitsDocumentation: This is an overview of returning visitors.
VisitFrequency.VisitFrequencyReportDocumentation: Shows comparative performance metrics of new and returning visitors side by side.
